text: Plotnikov (feminine: Plotnikova) is a Russian-language occupational surname derived from the occupation of carpenter (plotnik in Russian). Sometimes it may be transliterated as Plotnikoff. The surname may refer to: *Aleksandr Plotnikov *Alexey Plotnikov, better known under stage name Lex Plotnikoff, Russian composer and guitar player *Andrey Plotnikov *Boris Plotnikov *Igor Plotnikov *Ivan Plotnikov *Nikolai Plotnikov *Pavel Plotnikov, Soviet World War II pilot, twice Hero of the Soviet Union *Sergei Plotnikov *Vadym Plotnikov *Valeri Plotnikov *William Plotnikov, Russian-Canadian boxer *Yevgeni Plotnikov *Klavdiya Plotnikova *Yelena Plotnikova *Irina Plotnikova *Jana Plotnikova Category:Russian-language surnames Category:Occupational surnames
title: Plotnikov
